module.name: producttabcreator
module.description: Certain products need additional information... With this module you can create as many tabs you wish for each product that contain extra information.
module.author: Konstantinos Vazaios
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall? Your created tabs will be lost and all the extra information for each of your products will not display to customers. You will not be able to restore your created tabs!
